page.title: 09Education
page.content: {Criftins C.E. School}was opened on the 13th August 1931. The school is not very large and has less than 70 pupils . There are four classrooms, but only 3 are used for teaching. The other room is used as a music,television and a computer room.The school has a playground outside which has football and netball posts. Also outside is a Scout hut which is where we have our dinner. There is a bicycle shed by the main gate. At school we learn Maths,English and we also do creative writing,humanities,hand writing and spellings. School starts at 9am and finishes at 3pm.Every day we have three playtimes which come at 10.30, 12.35 and 2.15. The Headmaster is Mr. G.A. Podmore and the other two teachers are Mrs.A.Hawkins and Mrs J. Morgan. The
